S06pspdut2u:257: 01215 ca gaṅānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahāloka-

S06pspdut2u:261: 01219 tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati/ sa imām eva

S06pspdut2u:271: 01303 ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat/

S06pspdut2u:279: 01309 gamisyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśa-
S06pspdut2u:280: 01310 nāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena

S06pspdut2u:286: 01315 sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt/ etais tvaṃ
S06pspdut2u:287: 01316 kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ/
S06pspdut2u:289: 01317 bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ
S06pspdut2u:292: 01319 kareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata
S06pspdut2u:293: 01320 iti/ samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ/
S06pspdut2u:295: 01321 r durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ/
S06pspdut2u:296: 01401 atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt
S06pspdut2u:298: 01403 anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikā-
